content.raw: So is that door opening in 1 second still going to happen? Currently I have to force it open because it's slowing me down way too much. It's also surprisingly massive. I'm not sure if this is going to really be an official change or is it going to not happen. I'd like some info. As Aric said, it's an extremely drastic change. I also perform my own modifications to the models like the button fix  so getting a confirmation that this door is going to really open in 1 second would be extremely appreciated.
